mapper.select: SELECT entity_id, entity_name FROM entities WHERE entity_name like concat('%', #{entity}, '%')

SELECT e.entity_id, e.entity_name, c.concept_name AS attr_name, a.attr_value FROM concepts c, entities e, entity_attr a WHERE c.concept_name = #{attr} and c.c_id = a.attr_id and e.entity_id = a.entity_id ORDER BY a.attr_value_reg DESC LIMIT 1
